# Change Log

## v1.0.0

Initial Set of Hooks

|   Trigger | Content                    |
| --------: | -------------------------- |
|   `uref→` | useRef()                   |
|    `ust→` | useState()                 |
|   `ueff→` | useEffect()                |
|   `ulay→` | useLayoutEffect()          |
|   `ucon→` | useContext()               |
|  `ucall→` | useCallback()              |
|   `umem→` | useMemo()                  |
|   `uimp→` | useImperativeHandle()      |
|   `ured→` | useReducer()               |
| `udebug→` | useDebugValue()            |
|    `use→` | Generic for selecting hook |
